item.title: Fixed Wireless Broadband Includes Canada & Puerto Rico
item.description:
People often associate broadband with wired connections, like T1 lines commonly used by small to medium businesses, or the increasingly popular Ethernet option known for its speed and affordability. While satellite is vital for many chain stores, there’s another reliable broadband solution that avoids construction costs and high monthly fees: fixed wireless broadband, now available across the US, Canada, and Puerto Rico. Accel Networks, a leading provider of fixed wireless broadband, leverages existing 2...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fixed-wireless-broadband-includes-canada-puerto-rico/
